meaningMnemonic: A <radical>leader</radical> with a <radical>spoon</radical> is a powerful thing. Even something like a spoon when given to the right man or woman can make great <kanji>change</kanji> in the world.
readingMnemonic: Then, this hero of yours takes their spoon and says some magic words into it, <kanji>changing</kanji> it into a <reading>car</reading> (か).
